modName: Voice Pack for Ancano Follower Mod
summary:
This is DEFAU
LT JAPANESE Ancano voice pack for Ancano Follower MOD (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12900).
descriptionHtml:
Japanese Voice Pack for Ancano Follower ver.1.0

If you use this pack, your companion NPC \"Ancano the Thalmor\" will talk with you about topices concering companion in default Ancano Voice. You can add \"Ancano the Thalmor\" in your skyrim world by using \"Ancano Follower\" mod ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12900 ).

--Attention--
! This Voice Pack includes ONLY JAPANESE VOICE.
! If you use this pack, other male companions may talk in Ancano voice. 
! After this pack is adapted, \"Ancano the Thalmor\" will talk different words from caption. But I think Ancano fans like you won\'t care.

--what you need in using this pack--
skyrim.exe
Ancano Follower mod ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12900 , this mod is created by Sifka)

--Install--
Put \"Data\" Folder of this pack into your \"Skyrim\\Data\".

--Uninstall--
Delete all files in \"Skyrim\\Sound\\Voice\\skyrim.esm\\maleeventonedaccented\" Folder.
author: saegusa
